title: Reduced words for reflections in Weyl groups
abstract:
The reflections in a Coxeter group are defined as conjugates of a single
generator, and thus admit palindromic expressions as products of generators.
Our main result gives closed formulas providing a palindromic reduced
expression for each reflection in any finite Weyl group. There exist
algorithmic methods for determining such reduced expressions, but explicit
formulas have not been recorded outside of well-known special cases.
